changelog.title: Audit System
changelog.description: New automated audit scripts to detect content gaps, missing categories, and broken links before deployment.

changelog.title: Shield House Categories
changelog.description: Fixed category filtering for 90+ Shield House entries - all content now appears in proper category views.

changelog.title: Web House Categories
changelog.description: Fixed category filtering for 63 Web House entries - IP addressing, visualizers, and presentations properly categorized.

changelog.title: Pre-Deploy Checklist
changelog.description: Established audit process with documented patterns and scripts to catch issues before they reach production.
